message: {"meta": null, "content": [{"type": "text", "text": "Content type application/json; charset=utf-8 cannot be simplified to markdown, but here is the raw content:\nContents of https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/84/reviews:\n[{\"id\":3307132885,\"node_id\":\"PRR_kwDOOcuOYs7FHtfV\",\"user\":{\"login\":\"gemini-code-assist[bot]\",\"id\":176961590,\"node_id\":\"BOT_kgDOCow4Ng\",\"avatar_url\":\"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/in/956858?v=4\",\"gravatar_id\":\"\",\"url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D\",\"html_url\":\"https://github.com/apps/gemini-code-assist\",\"followers_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/followers\",\"following_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/following{/other_user}\",\"gists_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/gists{/gist_id}\",\"starred_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/starred{/owner}{/repo}\",\"subscriptions_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/subscriptions\",\"organizations_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/orgs\",\"repos_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/repos\",\"events_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/events{/privacy}\",\"received_events_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/received_events\",\"type\":\"Bot\",\"user_view_type\":\"public\",\"site_admin\":false},\"body\":\"## Code Review\\n\\nThis pull request successfully implements the ability to edit feed URLs, a valuable feature enhancement. The backend changes are robust, including a new PUT endpoint with proper validation and comprehensive tests. The frontend work is also well-executed, with a new modal for editing and an efficient DOM update mechanism that replaces only the modified widget. I have identified a potential performance issue in the backend where fetching all items of an updated feed could be slow for large feeds. Additionally, I've provided a few suggestions for the frontend to improve function purity, user experience, and code cleanliness. Overall, this is a solid contribution that significantly improves the application's functionality.\",\"state\":\"COMMENTED\",\"html_url\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/84#pullrequestreview-3307132885\",\"pull_request_url\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/84\",\"author_association\":\"CONTRIBUTOR\",\"_links\":{\"html\":{\"href\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/84#pullrequestreview-3307132885\"},\"pull_request\":{\"href\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/84\"}},\"submitted_at\":\"2025-10-06T20:22:14Z\",\"commit_id\":\"ebed0395cd51006093dba89851a40d8c757603ff\"}]", "annotations": null}], "isError": false}
